answers.answer: A lot of it, yes. Even with non cafeinated soda, the sugar intake is still quite high. I try to limit myself but sometimes its hard not to give in.

Yes, as Britt 434 said the sugar in it isn't good. It can cause you to jave gestational diabetes. Definitely hard sometimes...I crave coke but refuse to get one. I do drink soda here and there but I try to only drink caffeine free ones (sprite, root beer, orange, grape). And if I have a soda I try to do water for the rest of the day.
Sorry about spelling errors, this phone is driving me crazy.

question: Is it bad to drink a lot of soda while your pregnant ?
